languages.text: "Губернатор Медина, я намереваюсь собрать больше информации о лице, именующем себя Авелем Ханейманном. Допускаю, что под этим именем может скрываться мой наставник, {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}архимагос{/g} Амарнат".

traits.locale_text: "Губернатор Медина, я намереваюсь собрать больше информации о лице, именующем себя Авелем Ханейманном. Допускаю, что под этим именем может скрываться мой наставник, {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}архимагос{/g} Амарнат".

languages.text: "Governor Medineh, I intend to gather further information on the person calling himself Abel Haneumann. I do not exclude the possibility of it being an alias of my mentor, the {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat."
languages.original_text: "Губернатор Медина, я намереваюсь собрать больше информации о лице, именующем себя Авелем Ханейманном. Допускаю, что под этим именем может скрываться мой наставник, {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}архимагос{/g} Амарнат".

traits.locale_text: "Governor Medineh, I intend to gather further information on the person calling himself Abel Haneumann. I entertain the possibility of it being an alias of my mentor, the {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat."

"Governor Medineh, I intend to gather further information on the person calling himself Abel Haneumann. I do not exclude the possibility of it being an alias of my mentor, the {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat."

languages.text: "Gouverneur Medineh, ich habe vor, weitere Informationen über die Person zu sammeln, die sich Abel Haneumann nennt. Ich kann die Möglichkeit nicht ausschließen, dass es sich um ein Alias meines Mentors handelt, des {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Erzmagos{/g} Amarnat."
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh, I intend to gather further information on the person calling himself Abel Haneumann. I do not exclude the possibility of it being an alias of my mentor, the {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: "Gouverneur Medineh, ich habe vor, weitere Informationen über die Person zu sammeln, die sich Abel Haneumann nennt. Ich kann die Möglichkeit nicht ausschließen, dass es sich um ein Alias meines Mentors handelt, des {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Erzmagos{/g} Amarnat."

languages.text: « Gouverneur Medineh, je compte rassembler davantage d'informations sur la personne qui se fait appeler Abel Haneumann. Je n'écarte pas la possibilité qu'il puisse s'agir d'un pseudonyme de mon mentor, l'{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archimagos{/g} Amarnat. »
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh, I intend to gather further information on the person calling himself Abel Haneumann. I do not exclude the possibility of it being an alias of my mentor, the {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: « Gouverneur Medineh, je compte rassembler davantage d'informations sur la personne qui se fait appeler Abel Haneumann. Je n'écarte pas la possibilité qu'il puisse s'agir d'un pseudonyme de mon mentor, l'{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archimagos{/g} Amarnat. »

languages.text: “梅迪涅总督，我打算进一步了解那位自称亚伯·哈努曼之人的信息。这个名字有可能是我的导师，阿玛纳特{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大贤者{/g}用的化名，我无法排除这样的可能性。”
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh, I intend to gather further information on the person calling himself Abel Haneumann. I do not exclude the possibility of it being an alias of my mentor, the {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: “梅迪涅总督，我打算进一步了解那位自称亚伯·哈努曼之人的信息。这个名字可能是我的导师，{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大贤者{/g}阿玛纳特用的化名。”

languages.text: 「メディネ総督、アベル・ヘニュマンと名乗る人物について詳しい情報を収集したい。私の師である{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大賢人{/g}アマルナトの偽名であるという線も捨て切れないのだ」
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh, I intend to gather further information on the person calling himself Abel Haneumann. I do not exclude the possibility of it being an alias of my mentor, the {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: 「メディネ総督、アベル・ヘニュマンと名乗る人物について詳しい情報を収集したい。私の師である{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大賢人{/g}アマルナトの偽名であるという線も捨て切れないのだ」

languages.text: «Gobernador Medineh, tengo la intención de reunir más información sobre la persona que se hace llamar Abel Haneumann. No descarto la posibilidad de que sea un alias de mi mentor, el {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archimagos{/g} Amarnat».
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh, I intend to gather further information on the person calling himself Abel Haneumann. I do not exclude the possibility of it being an alias of my mentor, the {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: «Gobernador Medineh, tengo la intención de reunir más información sobre la persona que se hace llamar Abel Haneumann. No descarto la posibilidad de que sea un alias de mi mentor, el {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archimagos{/g} Amarnat».

languages.text: "Vali Medineh, kendine Abel Haneumann diyen bu kişi hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinme niyetindeyim. Bunun, yönderim {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Başmagos{/g} Amarnat'ın bir rumuzu olma ihtimalini göz ardı edemem."
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh, I intend to gather further information on the person calling himself Abel Haneumann. I do not exclude the possibility of it being an alias of my mentor, the {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: "Vali Medineh, kendine Abel Haneumann diyen bu kişi hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinme niyetindeyim. Bunun, mentorum {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Başmagos{/g} Amarnat'ın bir rumuzu olma ihtimalini göz ardı edemem."
